6.16.17  12:13 pm   do you think it is possible to learn how to play a drum kit with little to no access to one? I've been a percussionist for years (marching band snare, djembe in church, etc.) but can't drum on an actual drum where i live. i desperately want to expand my abilities so I can just sit down at a set and play without feeling totally lost. i know i need a lot more limb independence and just straight up muscle memory to do that.... do you think it's possible to develop those any other way?
